definition.text: Include paragraphs are used to include into a Docs Page paragraphs that belong to other Docs Pages. In order to do that, you need to reference a Docs Block Style paragraph located in some other Docs Page.

paragraphs.text: Project->Docs Page Category->Docs Page Name->Docs Page Block
Project : Is the project where the Docs Page belongs to.
Docs Page Category : Node, Concept or Topic.
Docs Page Name: For Nodes it is the type of node, for Concepts, the concept name, for topics, the topic's page name.

Docs Page Block: This is the Block name of the block of paragraphs you want to include. You need to have a paragraphs with a Docs Block Style on the target page, with the name you are specifying here.
